Class DatabaseConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • be.hubrussel.ti.goforchange.enquete.controllers.DatabaseConnector

  • public class DatabaseConnector
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Created by Samuel on 31/03/2014.

    Always call initDatabase before doing anything else!

    • Field Detail

      • DB_NAME

        private static final java.lang.String DB_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DATABASE_VERSION

        private static final int DATABASE_VERSION
        This is the database version number. Change this number if the structure changed and the old database could be incompatible with the new version. Attention! This will erase all data in the database. The same could happen when the user downgrades instead of upgrading.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
